leaflet.personalStatement: Over 35 years, Michael has a record of doing what he says in his manifestos without fear or favour. He believes that trust is critical - and so often lacking in politicians.

politicalExperience.achievements: He has been elected to North Norfolk District Council six times and to Norfolk County Council in 2013. At County, he sits on the influential Policy and Resources Committee and at District, he is a member of the Planning and Development Committee.

contactInformation.address: Church Farm, West Beckham, Holt, Norfolk, NR25 6NX

images.caption: Michael Baker - He's North Norfolk Through and Through

leaflet.additionalNotes: His outside interests include motor racing and gardening. He has been a trustee of the Holt Youth Project, a governor of Gresham's School and is a sponsor of Holt Rugby Club. He is a passionate believer that Britain should regain control over her own affairs.
